item.title: Andrew add a quote by Ben Okri
item.description: "We plan our lives according to a dream that came to us in our childhood, and we find that life alters our plans. And yet, at the end, from a rare height, we also see that our dream was our fate. It's just that providence had other ideas as to how we would get there. Destiny plans a different route, or turns the dream around, as if it were a riddle, and fulfills the dream in ways we couldn't have expected." -- Ben Okri

item.title: Andrew add a quote by Ben Okri
item.description: "Don't read what everyone else is reading. Check them out later, cautiously." -- Ben Okri
